text.__SUMMARY__:
Pinus douglasiana is a species of conifer in the family Pinaceae.
It is found only in Mexico. A common name is Douglas pine, but that name is often applied to the more widespread species Pseudotsuga menziesii which is also known as Douglas fir.
text.References: Conifer Specialist Group 1998.  Pinus douglasiana.   2006 IUCN Red List of Threatened Species.   Downloaded on 10 July 2007.
